faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Use this for expectations, links, and common questions.

items.question: Where do I change sections?
items.answer: Edit `src/config/content.ts` and toggle `enabled` on each section.

items.question: Can I remove motion/3D?
items.answer: Yes. Motion respects reduced motion, and 3D can be disabled in `src/config/site.ts`.

items.question: Is this a full app?
items.answer: No. It’s a landing page template (no auth, billing, dashboards, etc.).
